subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: In a bid to compete in the Tour Championship and to earn a Ryder Cup berth, the Deutsche Bank Championship is the seventh start in seven weeks for Brandt Snedeker.
snippet: In a bid to compete in the Tour Championship and to earn a Ryder Cup berth, the Deutsche Bank Championship is the seventh start in seven weeks for Brandt Snedeker.
